text: Consists of a barrel, a bolt carrier group, and a handguard, all of which enable the use of the rifle as one would expect to.

The barrel is 10.3 inches long, and is mainly used for firefights in an enclosed environment, where barrel length starts to matter a lot.  It is unlikely to be very accurate over long distances.
